heading: InterMingle
description: A social-media platform where users can either take quizzes made by the community, or create their own quizzes to share. Challenge yourself, your friends, or anyone else to see who prevails in the battle of smarts!

heading: Catwalk
description: An e-commerce platform with components that consist of Product Overview, Related Products & User Outfit, Questions & Answers, and Ratings & Review.

heading: Atelier
description: The back-end development for the Catwalk Project. Responsible for managing server calls between the client and the database, with millions of data entries pulled via ETL procedures, to mimic real-user traffic.

heading: Hype Kicks
description: For the fellow sneakerheads and/or hypebeasts, Hype Kicks is a visual sneaker database that allows a user to search a provided brand, as well as the year created. The user can also see upcoming releases for their favorite shoes.

heading: Github Dashboard
description: Simplied visualization of a Github user where the user searches for a name and have results returned.

heading: Spotify Clone
description: Replication of the Spotify application, using the Spotify Web API node to pull data from Spotify's database.
